Hello, I’m Wei-Wei Wu. software engineer, marathon runner, rock climber, taco lover.

University of Minnesota, Twin Cities Class of 2017. Cum Laude.

Interned previously at Amazon, UnitedHealth Group, and Lilitofu.

Interested in single threaded graph computations in Rust and isometric grids using dynamic.js
